attributes.action: Pay workers their hourly wage if they need to self isolate
attributes.additional_details: Workers cannot afford to self isolate on £94.25 a week. This will cancel the choice they have to make between health, food or keeping the roof over their head
attributes.background: If they need to self isolate and they are in the vulnerable category like cancer sufferers.and they have a GP or doctors note...the business can get this money back from the government

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
